CODACCOUNT_CODA_AGREEMENT_TEXT_100:
* Functionality Cookies
	These cookies allow the website or online property to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. These cookies can also be used to remember changes you have made to text size, fonts and other parts of web pages that you can customize. They may also be used to provide services you have asked for such as watching a video. The information these cookies collect may be anonymized and they cannot track your browsing activity on other websites.

* Advertising Cookies
These cookies are used to deliver adverts more relevant to you and your interests. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement as well as help measure the effectiveness of the advertising campaign.
CODACCOUNT_CODA_AGREEMENT_TEXT_099:
Types Of Cookies

* Strictly Necessary Cookies
	These cookies are essential in order to enable you to move around websites or online properties and use their features, such as accessing secure areas of a website. Without these cookies, services you have asked for, like secure login areas, cannot be provided.

* Performance (or Analytics) Cookies
These cookies collect information about how visitors use a website or online property, for instance which pages visitors go to most often, and if they get error messages from web pages.  These cookies don’t collect information that identifies a visitor. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. They are only used to improve how a website or other online property works. We generally contract with independent research and measurement companies, such as Google Analytics, to provide these services on our behalf and which may also be subject to their own privacy policies.
CODACCOUNT_CODA_AGREEMENT_TEXT_098:

Activision - to recognize and associate activity with your computer or device when it visits an Activision website or other online property.  Activision cookies cannot be used to recognize or associate activity with your computer or device when it visits other, third party websites or online properties. 

Third Parties - to enable third party features or functionality to be provided on or through Activision's websites or other online properties (e.g. advertising and analytics).  The third parties that set these cookies can recognize your computer or device both when it visits Activision websites or other online properties in question and also when it visits certain other non-Activision websites or online properties that use the third party's features and functionality
CODACCOUNT_CODA_AGREEMENT_TEXT_097:
COOKIES
What are “Cookies” and does Activision use cookies, track IP Addresses, or use other passive means to collect information? 
Activision uses cookies on its websites and other online properties. A "cookie" is a small bit of record-keeping information that many websites and other online properties often store on a user's computer or device in order to anonymously identify it and associate activity with it. Cookies typically do not include people's names, or e-mail addresses. 

When visiting our websites and other online services you can choose whether or not to let us enable cookies. We use cookies to optimize your visit, make your browsing experience as effective as possible, and let you know about offers that we think will interest you. This means that if you refuse, your use of our websites and other online properties may be impaired as a result.

In using our “send-a-friend” tool you confirm that you and party to whom you are sending the message know each other.

This information will be used only for the purpose of solving your customer support inquiry and will be saved for twelve (12) months in the event additional customer support requests arise.

ZM_TUTORIALS_AFTERLIFE:
Welcome to the AFTERLIFE ARCADE!

Here you can earn a SOUL TOKEN by playing the games in the arcade and filling the SOUL METER at the bottom of the screen. You can also spectate the other players in your game if you want to keep your eye on the action. With an earned SOUL TOKEN, you can instantly revive yourself and rejoin the fight by exiting the SELF REVIVE DOOR.
ZM_TUTORIALS_ATM: Need a rainy day fund?  Deposit cash into the ATM for park visitors to withdraw. Deposits and withdrawals are handled in $1000 increments and can be shared between all visitors.
ZM_TUTORIALS_DOOR_BUY: Throughout Spaceland you will find doors that block your entrance into some locations of the park. For a small fee you can purchase your way past these barricades and gain access to more areas of the park. See if you can explore the entire park!
ZM_TUTORIALS_FORTUNE_DECK: Now that your Fate and Fortune Meter is full you can use one of the cards in your deck.  When you run out of cards, visit one of the Fortune Tellers to replenish your deck.
ZM_TUTORIALS_LOST_AND_FOUND: Dead and lost your weapons? No worries. When playing with others, return to the LOST & FOUND located at the park’s main entrance to recover your weapons. Don’t waste too much time though. The park will only hold your stuff for a limited time.
ZM_TUTORIALS_MAGIC_WHEEL: See that shaft of light in the sky? The MAGIC WHEEL awards players a random weapon for a small fee. Some of the weapons in the MAGIC WHEEL cannot be found anywhere else within Spaceland. Watch out though, sometimes the wheel will only award you a consolation prize. Find the MAGIC WHEEL, give it a spin and press your luck!
ZM_TUTORIALS_NEIL:
Hey, thanks for putting N31L back together!

Now that he’s back, N31L is looking for some worthy park goers to show they have the right stuff to save Spaceland. Try completing the N31L challenges that appear in the top left of the screen and he just might return the favor.  Good luck!
ZM_TUTORIALS_PACK_A_PUNCH: Upgrading your weapons in zombies is crucial to your survival in later scenes. Through the elusive Pack A Punch machine you can further increase the power of your weapons for a fee. Most weapons can be upgraded multiple times and even gain new abilities.
ZM_TUTORIALS_PERKS: Sprinkled throughout Spaceland are 10 PERK stations that, for a fee, can greatly expand your capabilities. You can carry up to 5 PERKS at a time and can mix and match which you pair up. Be careful though, if you go down you will lose all of your PERKS and have to repurchase them!
ZM_TUTORIALS_POWER_UPS: Zombies will occasionally drop POWER UPS after being killed that offer insane temporary upgrades for the entire team. Simply walk into a POWER UP to collect it and it activates immediately. Don't wait too long though, POWER UPS time out after a short period of time so collect them as soon as you can or you might miss out!
ZM_TUTORIALS_POWER_SWITCHES: Throughout Spaceland there are POWER SWITCHES that can be turned on that activate key things within the park like PERK stations and TRAPS. POWER SWITCHES are free to activate and permanently activate POWER for their given area. Try to find all of the POWER SWITCHES and completely restore power to Spaceland.
ZM_TUTORIALS_PILLAGE: When zombies are killed they will occasionally drop bags on the ground. The bags contain random items like ammo clips, cash and more! Try searching the dropped bags to see what the zombies left behind for you.
ZM_TUTORIALS_QUESTS: Spaceland features a set of QUESTS that can be completed by recovering specific items spread out and hidden within the park. When a QUEST item is recovered it will appear in your inventory screen [{togglescores}]. Recovering these QUEST items puts you one step closer to solving the mysteries of Spaceland and hopefully one step closer to escaping Willard Wyler's epic film.
ZM_TUTORIALS_SCENES: In zombies players are pitted against wave after wave of zombies. Each SCENE contains a set number of zombies to defeat. When all of the zombies are killed, the SCENE ends and the next one begins. Watch out though, the zombies get craftier and more powerful with every SCENE.
ZM_TUTORIALS_SOUVENIR_COINS: SOUVENIR COINS can be obtained by killing zombies and can be traded in for goodies at one of the many SOUVENIR STATIONS located in and around Spaceland. If you already have a SOUVENIR COIN you can swap to another.
ZM_TUTORIALS_SOUVENIR_STATIONS: SOUVENIR STATIONS can craft special Spaceland goodies. By depositing 3 SOUVENIR COINS into a station, players are awarded a SOUVENIR. Try to mix and match formulas to see all of the SOUVENIRS you can earn!
ZM_TUTORIALS_TEAM_DOOR_BUY: Some of the doors within Spaceland can be opened with team work. Players can take turns depositing money into the door to open it so that no one player is saddled with the cost burden. Deposit increments are $1000 per player.
ZM_TUTORIALS_TICKETS: TICKETS can be earned by playing games within the park like Octonian Hunter, killing zombies with TRAPS and recovered in dropped PILLAGE bags. TICKETS can be exchanged at one of the TICKET PRIZE BOOTHS located around Spaceland. Keep an eye out for very special items that can only be purchased with TICKETS.
ZM_TUTORIALS_TRAPS: Throughout Spaceland parts of the park have been altered into traps that can kill lots of zombies and protect players when things get tough. TRAPS cost a small fee and can earn players valuable Spaceland park TICKETS for every kill they gain the player.
ZM_TUTORIALS_WINDOW_BOARDING: Barricades have been set up to keep the zombies out. The problem is the zombies keep tearing the WINDOW BOARDS down. If you put the boards back up, you can keep zombies out of the play space longer and gain some cash for each board you restore. Try to keep Spaceland secure and yourself safe!
ZM_TUTORIALS_ZOMBIE_HEALTH: Every SCENE the zombie capabilities will increase. They will move faster, do more damage and make more aggressive attempts at eating your brains. The later the SCENE, the more powerful your zombie adversaries will be.  Be sure to aim for the head, as headshots do a lot more damage!
ZM_TUTORIALS_CRAFTABLE: There are a variety of SOUVENIRS available from using different combinations of SOUVENIR COINS.  To pull out your SOUVENIR press [{+actionslot 3}] and then press [{+attack}] to place it.
ZM_TUTORIALS_FORTUNE_CARD_MACHINE: There are Fortune Tellers throughout Spaceland, eager and willing to restock your Fate and Fortune Cards...for a fee of course.
ZM_TUTORIALS_WALL_BUY: There are a variety of weapons available for purchase in Spaceland. If you come across a weapon you are already in possession of, you can buy ammo at a discount. You can only carry two weapons at a time without the Mule Munchies perk candy.
ZM_TUTORIALS_RESET_TUTORIAL_TEXT: Are you sure you would like to reset the interactive tutorials?
ZM_TUTORIALS_GUIDED_TOUR: Would you like a guided tour of Spaceland?
ZM_TUTORIALS_CONFIRM: You can always re-enable the guided tour in the "Tips and Tricks" menu.

CP_MERITS_PRESTIGE_1_DESC: Raise your acting profile to level 40.

Make it from "No More Casting Calls" to "Don't I Know You"
( Level 60 )

Go from "Don't I Know You" to a true "B Level" actor.
( Level 80 )
CP_MERITS_PRESTIGE_4_DESC:
Transition from a "B Level" actor to a "Cult Favorite."
( Level 100 )
CP_MERITS_PRESTIGE_5_DESC:
Move from a "Cult Favorite" into an "Indie Darling."
( Level 120 )
CP_MERITS_PRESTIGE_6_DESC:
Step up from an "Indie Darling" to become a major "Award Winner."
( Level 140 )
CP_MERITS_PRESTIGE_7_DESC:
First an "Award Winner", next stop "Movie Star."
( Level 160 )
CP_MERITS_PRESTIGE_8_DESC:
Your worldwide "Movie Star" status increases to "International Superstar."
( Level 180 )

Put your "International Superstar" status to good and become a "Philanthropist."

CP_MERITS_WEAPON_EARNED_DESC: Equip this weapon from the Magic Wheel to unlock.
CP_MERITS_TALI_1_DESC: Complete the Director's Cut version of "Zombies in Spaceland"
CP_MERITS_TALI_2_DESC: Complete the Director's Cut version of "Rave in the Redwoods"

CP_MERITS_TALI_4_DESC: Complete the Director's Cut version of "Attack of the Radioactive Thing"

CP_LOADOUT_WALL_DESC: Laser Walls can be connected to provide a perimeter defense from most enemy types.
CP_LOADOUT_SNIPER_TOWER_DESC: The Sniper Tower allows for a heightened vantage point, perfect for picking off enemies at a distance.
CP_LOADOUT_ARMORDEPOT_DESC: The Armor Regen Field will slowly regenerate the player's armor if they are within it's range.
CP_LOADOUT_TROPHY_DESC: The Iron Dome protects against projectile attacks by nullifying them when they are within range.
CP_LOADOUT_ANTIAIR_DESC: The Anti-Air Missile Launching System attacks airborne enemies with a barrage of missiles.
CP_LOADOUT_IMF_DESC: The I.M.F. targets nearby enemies and fires an explosive charge that will detonate on contact.
CP_LOADOUT_LIGHTNING_TOWER_DESC: The Lightning Tower arcs a powerful electric bolt at nearby enemies.  Those who don't get killed will get stunned in their tracks.
CP_LOADOUT_PHALANX_DESC: Phalanxes are powerful automated machine gun turrets that can mow down enemies.
CP_LOADOUT_GENERATOR_DESC: These Generators provide additional power to the grid and enabling more defenses to be able to be deployed.
CP_LOADOUT_ACCELERATOR_DESC: The Extractor Accelerator hastens the extraction process by siphoning the grid's power and feeding it back into the Extractor.
CP_LOADOUT_MEDUSA_BOMB_DESC: The Medusa Device absorbs the souls of fallen enemies. When the Medusa has filled completely it can be detonated, causing a massive destructive shockwave that will eliminate all enemies.
CP_LOADOUT_WEAPONDEPOT_DESC: The Weapon Upgrade Module allows allies to upgrade their current primary weapon.  Multiple levels of upgrades are available.
CP_LOADOUT_PERK_ROBOTICS_DESC:
The Robotics Expert believes the answer to everything can be found in AI. They rely solely on the companions they've built to survive.

[{+smoke}] ^3Kinetic Pulse [{+frag}] Repulsor^7

[{+gostand}] ^2Double Jump^7

^5Passive:^7 Regenerative Armor

[{+actionslot 4}][{+actionslot 4}]: Vulture Drone
CP_LOADOUT_PERK_DEMOLITION_DESC:
The Demolitions Expert enjoys blowing things up. There's nothing that can't be solved with an explosive.

[{+smoke}] ^3Mortar Mount [{+frag}] Plasma Grenade^7

[{+stance}] (While in air) ^1Ground Slam^7
[{+gostand}] ^2Boost Jump^7

^5Passive:^7 Increased Explosives Damage

[{+actionslot 4}][{+actionslot 4}]: Mortar Strike
CP_LOADOUT_PERK_GUNSLINGER_DESC:
The Gunslinger cannot sit still. They run around with akimbo pistols and attempt to wear down the opposition.

[{+smoke}] ^3Increased Speed [{+frag}] Blink Knife^7

[{+stance}] (While sprinting) ^1Battle Slide^7
[{+gostand}] ^2Double Jump^7

^5Passive:^7 Extreme Conditioning

[{+actionslot 4}][{+actionslot 4}]: Enhances ammunition with arcing voltage rounds.
CP_LOADOUT_PERK_HYBRID_DESC:
Hybrids have an understanding of everything... 'unique'.  Their unique kinship with the Cryptid species provides them a different view of the world.

[{+smoke}] ^3Phase Shift [{+frag}] Bola Barrage^7

[{+gostand}] ^2Double Jump^7

[{+actionslot 4}][{+actionslot 4}]: Summon Pet
CP_LOADOUT_SKILL_BULLET_DAMAGE_DESC: Increased damage, unlimited ammo and a damage boost for nearby allies.
CP_LOADOUT_SKILL_INVULNERABLE_DESC: While invulnerable, all nearby enemies will be attracted to the player who can finish them off with a powerful Stun Melee.
CP_LOADOUT_SKILL_STASIS_DESC: The Stasis Field protects allies who are within it's bounds.
CP_LOADOUT_SKILL_DRONE_DESC: Launch a drone that follows and protects.
CP_LOADOUT_SKILL_MORTAR_DESC: Rain pain from above with a series of explosions that will decimate nearby enemies.
CP_LOADOUT_SKILL_ARCING_DESC: Enemies shot will arc electricity to nearby enemies, stunning them.
CP_LOADOUT_SKILL_PET_DESC: Summon a friendly Cryptid to protect the team.
CP_LOADOUT_PRIMARY_WEAPON_DESC: Available Primary Weapons are unique per class.
CP_LOADOUT_CLASS_SKILL_DESC: Class Skills are activated by double tapping . They provide a unique ability, specific for the particular class.
CP_LOADOUT_BUILDINGS_DESC:
Deployable Structures are purchased in game and dropped in to help defend the outpost.

Choose 3.
CP_LOADOUT_SKILL_HEAL_DESC: Instantly revive nearby downed allies. Provide increased health regeneration for allies within radius.
CP_LOADOUT_PHASE_SHIFT_ERROR: You can't use this ability while in Phase Shift
CP_LOADOUT_OFFHAND_PRIMARY_DESC: Offhand primary powers can be triggered by RB.  They are replenished after the completion of each wave.
ALIENS_PERK_HEALTH_DESC:
The Tank Class excels while being in the middle of a group of enemies. What's lacking in mobility is made up for in durability.

[{+smoke}] ^3Siege Mode [{+frag}] Cluster Grenade^7

[{+stance}] (While in air) ^1Ground Slam^7
[{+gostand}] ^2Boost Jump^7

^5Passive:^7 Double Health & Double Melee Damage

Fills the team's weapons ammo stock to the maximum.
Fills the current clip before adding max ammo.

ALIENS_TEAM_RANDOMBOX_DESC_3: A random mix of +3 level support items as well as a variety of other items.
ALIENS_TEAM_RANDOMBOX_DESC_4: A random mix of +4 level supplies.  Rare items are more common.

ALIENS_PREDATOR_DESC: A remote-controlled missile system with controllable thrust.
ALIENS_PREDATOR_DESC_2: Fire a smart drone projectile while controlling the Trinity Missile.
ALIENS_PREDATOR_DESC_3: Fire two high velocity smart drone projectiles.
ALIENS_PREDATOR_DESC_4: Fire four high velocity smart drone projectiles.
ALIENS_WAR_MACHINE_DESC_1: Blast shield prohibits grenades from damaging the player.
ALIENS_WAR_MACHINE_DESC_2: Faster Movement and explosions have a larger radius.
ALIENS_DEATH_MACHINE_DESC_2: Movement speed is increased and ammo can pierce the head plates of Hunters.
ALIENS_PERK_PISTOL_MAGNUM_DESC_1: Increased damage at long range and faster movement when the pistol is equipped.
ALIENS_PERK_PISTOL_MAGNUM_DESC_3: Hip Fire two pistols for twice the firepower and twice the ammo capacity.
ALIENS_PERK_PISTOL_MAGNUM_DESC_4: Carry your pistol plus two primary weapons.
ALIENS_TEAM_ADRENALINE_DESC:
See enemies through walls.
Increased sprint endurance.
Regenerate health faster.
Lasts 45 sec.
ALIENS_TEAM_ADRENALINE_DESC_4: Increases the booster's duration by 3x and adds increased sprint endurance.
ALIENS_SOLDIER_TYPE_DESC:
What kind of soldier will you be going into this fight?

Choose between eight types of soldiers: a tank, a weapon specialist, a medic, an engineer, a robotics expert, a demolitions expert, a gunslinger, and a hybrid.

Tip: When partying up, try having different types of soldiers on your team.
ALIENS_PISTOL_TYPE_DESC:
Your pistol is there with you from the beginning and can never leave your side.

The pistol can be upgraded using skill points.  Upgrades will boost the damage, ammo capacity, and even allow you to hold two pistols at once, akimbo style.

Tip: Upgrade the pistol enough so you can carry two primary weapons alongside it.
ALIENS_AMMO_TYPE_DESC:
Ammo is in short supply and, therefore, extremely valuable.

Throw down an ammo cache for the entire team to resupply from.  Additional ammo types such as stun, incendiary, explosive and armor piercing will give your team the extra firepower they need to finish the job.
ALIENS_TEAM_SUPPORT_DESC:
Provide supplies for the team by deploying a cache for everyone to restock from.

Supplies such as armor, explosives, and boosters will benefit the entire team. Use your skill points in game to further increase the duration and effectiveness of the supplies.

Tip: Encourage teammates to each use a different supply as their benefits will compound.
ALIENS_STRIKE_PACKAGE_DESC:
The ultimate in firepower, strike packages are perfect for defense or for raining pain.

They may cost a bit more, but strike packages are well worth it.  A fully levelled up strike package can do serious damage.

Tip: Experiment with different options, and don't forget to level them up.
ALIENS_EQUALIZER_DESC:
The Equalizers provide personal, heavy firepower.

Generally hand-held weapons, these can be purchased in a pinch, regardless of the total ammo at hand.

Tip: Choose an Equalizer based on playing style.  If you run a lot, try putting the Riot Shield on your back by changing weapons.
ALIENS_NERF_DESC:
Relics are earned by passing Rank 30.  They increase the difficulty and, thus, enhance the score.

Each time the player passes Rank 30 they get the privilege of using an additional Relic.  Up to five Relics can be used at once.  The more Relics used, the higher the scoring bonus received.
ALIENS_PRESTIGE_TAKE_MORE_DAMAGE_DESC: Players take more damage when injured.
ALIENS_PRESTIGE_SLOWER_SPEED_DESC: Move slower overall and Medic Upgrades and Feral Instincts do not affect movement speed. No reloading while sprinting.
ALIENS_PRESTIGE_LOWER_DAMAGE_DESC: Inflict less damage against the aliens.
ALIENS_LEAVE_GAME_DESC: Do you really want to leave the game?
ALIENS_BLOCKER_HIVE_DRILL_HINT: Drill ineffective against the barrier hive
ALIENS_NEW_RELIC_SLOT_DESC: You have Unlocked a new Relic Slot
ALIENS_TEAM_AMMO_SPECIAL_DESC_1: Gives 40% max stock Stun ammo to all weapons.
ALIENS_UPGRADE_REQ_DLC: This upgrade requires the &&1 Map Pack.
ALIENS_NEXT_EPISODE: Upgrade available in the next episode.
ALIENS_BONUS_POOL_TIP: Destroy Hives to get Teeth in the bonus pool.
ALIENS_BONUS_POOL_DESC: The bonus pool refills when the timer expires.
ALIENS_CHAOS_DIFF_DESC: Chaos Mode only supports Regular difficulty.
ALIENS_DISABLED_IN_CHAOS: Has no effect in Chaos Mode
ALIENS_PRESTIGE_SLOW_HEALTH_REGEN_DESC: Slow health regeneration, no regeneration while sprinting and falling damage is enabled.
ALIENS_PRESTIGE_NO_ABILITIES_DESC: No Equalizers or Strike Packages available.
ALIENS_PRESTIGE_HALF_AMMO_DESC: Ammo refills, and weapon pickups will give you less ammo.

LANGUAGE_SELECT_CONFIRM_CHANGE: Do you want to apply your selection and restart the game?

PASSIVES_DOUBLE_KILL_RELOAD_DESC: Double kills instantly reload your magazine.
PASSIVES_EXPLOSIVE_KILLS_DESC: Longshot kills create a small explosion.

PASSIVES_MINIMAP_DAMAGE_DESC: Damage causes target to show on mini map.

PASSIVES_SMOKE_DESC_EQUIP: Adds a short burst of smoke when upon explosion.

PASSIVES_INCREASED_DURATION_DESC: Stays active for a longer period of time.

PASSIVES_OVERCHARGE_RECOIL_DESC: Reduces recoil by 25% while overcharge is active.
PASSIVES_GRENADE_TO_MINE_DESC: This grenade now acts as a mine.
PASSIVES_TELEPORT_REVERSE_DESC: Pressing Teleport again within 1 second returns you to your original location.
PASSIVES_REWIND_HP_AMMO_DESC: Rewinds the player's Health and Ammo

PASSIVES_BURST_FIRE_3_DESC: Deals increased damage in quick, ^23^7 bullet bursts.
PASSIVES_BURST_FIRE_4_DESC: Fires ^24^7 bullet bursts in submachine gun mode.

PASSIVES_SINGLE_FIRE_DESC: Deals increased damage, but fires ^21^7 bullet at a time.
PASSIVES_REDUCED_BURST_COOLDOWN_DESC: Reduces the time between burst fires and increases recoil.
PASSIVES_REDUCED_HIP_SPREAD_SNIPER_DESC: Reduced hip spread with visible crosshair.
PASSIVES_REDUCED_SLIDE_SPREAD_DESC: Reduces hip fire spread while sliding.
PASSIVES_REDUCED_JUMP_SPREAD_DESC: Reduces hip fire spread while jumping.
PASSIVES_INCREASED_ADS_STABILITY_DESC: Reduced idle sway while aiming down sights.

PASSIVES_REGENERATE_AMMO_DESC: Slowly regenerates ammo while not firing.
PASSIVES_REFILL_AMMO_DESC: Automatically refills mag from your stock over time.
PASSIVES_FASTER_ADS_DESC: Speeds up aiming and reduces hip fire accuracy. (Stacks with ^3Quick Draw^7)

PASSIVES_ERAD_SHOTGUN_DESC: This gun has an under barrel shotgun.

PASSIVES_RIPPER_DESC: Gives approx. ^25^7 seconds of faster melee to the player

PASSIVES_REFRESH_DESC: ^25^7 player kill streak restores 1 lethal and tactical.
PASSIVES_BERSERK_DESC: Killing an enemy grants increased fire rate and reduced recoil for a short time.
PASSIVES_FIRE_KILL_DESC: Enemies killed by this weapon will burn for a short period of time.
PASSIVES_BACKFIRE_DESC: This weapon will explode in the hands of an enemy player when fired.
PASSIVES_DOUBLE_DAMAGE_DESC: Double damage. Slower fire rate, ADS, and move speed.
PASSIVES_DOUBLE_AMMO_DESC: Double magazine size. Can no longer reload.
PASSIVES_HIGH_DAMAGE_DESC: Extremely high damage. ^21^7 bullet in each magazine.
PASSIVES_RANDOM_ATTACHMENTS_DESC: Gain ^21^7 random attachment when you spawn.

PASSIVES_HEADSHOT_SUPER_DESC: Headshot kills grant a small bonus to your Payload meter.
PASSIVES_HITMAN_DESC: Killing all enemy players grants a large bonus to your Payload meter.
PASSIVES_SONIC_DESC: Increased damage while sliding.  Damage causes slight hearing loss.
PASSIVES_AKIMBO_DESC: Akimbo with improved hip spread. Can no longer aim down sights.
PASSIVES_INFINITE_AMMO_DESC: Large mag size. Taking damage fully regenerates mag.
PASSIVES_BURST_SHOTGUN_DESC: Releases a wide energy blast when fired.
PASSIVES_EXPLOSIVE_DAMAGE_DESC: Bullets cause a small explosion, damaging nearby enemies.
PASSIVES_FULL_AUTO_DESC: This weapon fires as fully automatic with reduced recoil.
PASSIVES_PROJECTILE_DESC: Bullets from this weapon become high damage projectiles.
PASSIVES_MELEE_KILL_DESC: Melee attacks with this weapon cause enemies to explode.
PASSIVES_HIP_FIRERATE_DESC: Increases hip fire rate and reduces Aim Down Sights fire rate.
PASSIVES_HIVEMIND_DESC: While equipped, all teammates will be outlined.
PASSIVES_SCOUTPING_DESC: While sprinting, release pings that detect nearby enemies.
PASSIVES_BEAM_DESC: Releases a concentrated beam of energy.
PASSIVES_MAX_RANGE_DESC: Infinite damage range with reduced fire rate.
PASSIVES_BELOW_THE_BELT_DESC: Bonus damage towards the groin instead of headshots.
PASSIVES_HUNTER_KILLER_DESC: No sniper glint. Enemies at low health are highlighted.
PASSIVES_SOFTCORE_DESC: Shooting teammates in hardcore mode no longer damages you.
PASSIVES_SCORE_BONUS_OBJECTIVES_DESC: Completing objectives grants additional score points.
PASSIVES_SMART_SHOT_DESC: Bullets from this weapon now track enemies in a small radius.
PASSIVES_HEADSHOT_DESC: Bonus headshot damage, reduced damage towards legs.
PASSIVES_SCORESTREAK_PACK_DESC: Enemies drop scorestreak packs for your team when killed.
PASSIVES_REDUCED_SPREAD_ON_USE_DESC: Hip fire spread reduced with each shot.
PASSIVES_SILENCER_DESC: Comes with an advanced ^3Suppressor^7 with normal damage range.
PASSIVES_JUMP_SLIDE_SPREAD_DESC: Greatly reduced spread while jumping and sliding.
PASSIVES_NUKE_DESC_CP: Get ^2150^7 kills with this weapon without going into Last Stand to earn a Nuke powerup.
PASSIVES_REFRESH_DESC_CP: Get ^250^7 kills with this weapon without going into Last Stand to restock your lethal equipment.
PASSIVES_HEADSHOT_AMMO_DESC_CP: Headshot kills instantly refill your magazine.
PASSIVES_HEADSHOT_SUPER_DESC_CP: Headshot kills by this weapon grant a small bonus to your Fate and Fortune card meter.
PASSIVES_DOUBLE_KILL_RELOAD_DESC_CP: Quadruple kills instantly reload your magazine.
PASSIVES_HEALTH_REGEN_ON_KILL_DESC_CP: Accelerate your health regen every two kills.
PASSIVES_HITMAN_DESC_CP: Killing 10 zombies in 10 seconds grants you a large bonus to your Fate and Fortune meter.
PASSIVES_SONAR_DESC: Under barrel sonar attachment. Can no longer aim down sights.
PASSIVES_AKIMBO_SHOTGUN_DESC: Alternate mode now fires as akimbo shotguns.
PASSIVES_SINGLE_FIRE_PISTOL_DESC: Fires powerful bullets with heavy recoil.
PASSIVES_ADS_MOVE_SPEED_DESC: Increased movement speed while aiming down sights.
PASSIVES_REFLEX_DESC: Built-in custom Reflex Sight and Tracking Chip. ADS time improved for all scopes.
PASSIVES_DECREASED_DURATION_DESC: Active for a shorter period of time.
PASSIVES_EXTRA_ASSIST_DESC: Increased assist points, but at a higher scorestreak cost.
PASSIVES_INCREASED_DEBUFF_DESC: Increased duration of non lethal effects.
PASSIVES_SPLIT_STRIKE_DESC: Manually choose strike paths for each plane.
PASSIVES_EXTRA_FLARE_DESC: Holds an additional flare to deter lock on missiles, but has a lower active life time.
PASSIVES_HIGH_BEAM_DESC: Has a high output energy based weapon.
PASSIVES_MOVING_FORTRESS_DESC: Rear turret now fires bullets; however both turrets fire at a slower rate.
PASSIVES_PRECISION_STRIKE_DESC: Scorchers fly in a single line, striking the same path.
PASSIVES_ONE_PLANE_DESC: Planes no longer fly in formation, and come in one at a time.
PASSIVES_SLOW_TURRET_DESC: Turrets have a slower rate of fire.
PASSIVES_HEAVY_DESC: Higher chassis weight, hindering vertical boost.
PASSIVES_INCREASED_FROST_DESC: Increased frost duration, but with a lower active life time.
PASSIVES_THROW_AXE_DESC: Can be thrown and picked up.
PASSIVES_MELEE_SUPER_DESC: Melee kills grant a large bonus to your Payload meter.
PASSIVES_JUMP_SUPER_DESC: Kills while airborne grant a small bonus to your Payload meter.
PASSIVES_MODE_SWITCH_SCORE_DESC: Kills in alternating modes grant bonus score.
PASSIVES_XMAGSE_DESC: Rapidly generates energy ammo, even when stowed.
PASSIVES_DOUBLE_KILL_SUPER_DESC: Double kills grant a large bonus to your Payload meter.
PASSIVES_MELEE_CONE_EXPL_DESC: Melee kills in alt mode create a cone explosion.
PASSIVES_WALLRUN_QUIETER_DESC: Grants Dead Silence while airborne or wall running.
PASSIVES_SLIDE_BLASTSHIELD_DESC: Grants Blast Shield while crouched, prone, or sliding.
PASSIVES_PRONE_BLINDEYE_DESC: Grants Blind Eye while prone after a short delay.
PASSIVES_STATIONARY_ENGINEER_DESC: Grants Engineer while crouched or prone. Will also activate while standing still after a short delay.
PASSIVES_LEADER_KILL_SCORE_DESC: Killing the top enemy scorer grants bonus score.
PASSIVES_SNIPER_PISTOL_DESC: Modifies this weapon into a semi-auto sniper pistol.
PASSIVES_BOMB_TRAP_DESC: A fake low cost care package filled with explosives.
PASSIVES_REROLL_DESC: Able to reroll the contents of the package, with lower odds for higher tier scorestreaks.
PASSIVES_HIGH_ROLLER_DESC: Only contains higher tier scorestreaks, but at an increased cost.
PASSIVES_LOW_ROLLER_DESC: Lower chance to get high tier scorestreaks.
PASSIVES_SLOW_ONI_DESC: Greatly increased fire rate that decelerates over time.
PASSIVES_GUARD_DESC: Replaces Radar mode with the ability to guard a specified location.
PASSIVES_SELF_DESTRUCT_DESC: Lower health, but with the ability to seek out and explode on a nearby target when reaching critical levels.
PASSIVES_SEEKER_DESC: Slower moving Vulture that patrols the area looking for targets instead of following its owner.
PASSIVES_FAST_LAUNCH_DESC: Explosive payloads arrive quicker, but at a smaller capacity.
PASSIVES_DECREASED_EXPLOSIONS_DESC: Fewer explosions in the targeted area.
PASSIVES_EXTRA_SELECTION_DESC: Able to make an extra selection on the target map, at a higher scorestreak cost.
PASSIVES_IMPULSE_EXPLOSION_DESC: Automatically locks onto and fires a single payload at each enemy position.
PASSIVES_SINGLE_EXPLOSION_DESC: Only fires off a single explosive per location.
PASSIVES_STEALTH_VEHICLE_DESC: Hidden through the use of reflective camo, but has lower movement speed.
PASSIVES_VISION_SWEEP_DESC: Enemy markers are always visible and updated in real time, but for a shorter duration.
PASSIVES_DISABLE_HUD_DESC: A lower life time Counter UAV that shuts down the enemy's HUD.
PASSIVES_EMP_BLAST_DESC: On entry all enemy equipment and scorestreaks are destroyed, but the cost is increased by a vast amount.
PASSIVES_PREDATOR_DESC: Single payload with a large explosion that ripples outwards.
PASSIVES_NO_MISSILES_DESC: No longer has two side missiles to fire.
PASSIVES_IMPLOSION_DESC: Starts to implode on impact, sucking in nearby enemies before exploding.
PASSIVES_RAPID_MISSILES_DESC: Able to continously fire a series of non-tracking missiles per launch.
PASSIVES_FAST_SWEEP_DESC: A low health turret with faster target acquisition.
PASSIVES_SAM_TURRET_DESC: Fires missiles at aerial targets; charged rounds no longer shock nearby enemies.
PASSIVES_NO_SHOCK_DESC: Will no longer shock nearby targets on impact.
PASSIVES_MINI_EXPLOSIVES_DESC: Slow firing turret that shoots multiple tracking missiles at targets.
PASSIVES_SEEK_CLUSTER_DESC: Tracking clusters are no longer player controlled, and will freely seek out targets in view.
PASSIVES_NO_CURSOR_DESC: Cluster missiles no longer track and move with the reticle.
PASSIVES_SWITCH_THRUST_DESC: Can switch flight direction with the use of [{+speed_throw,+toggleads_throw,+ads_akimbo_accessible}].
PASSIVES_ENERGY_MACHGUN_DESC: Replaces main weapon with a fast firing energy machine gun.
PASSIVES_BOOSTERS_DESC: Able to perform a short vertical boost by holding [{+gostand}].
PASSIVES_AUTO_MISSILES_DESC: Missiles automatically seek out visible targets, but comes with a longer reload time.
PASSIVES_TWIN_DRAGONS_DESC: Equipped with a pair of high damaging laser turrets.
PASSIVES_SUPPORT_DROP_DESC: Delivers three care packages with a reduced chance of high tier streaks.  Cost is vastly increased.
PASSIVES_GL_DESC: This weapon has a single use ^3underbarrel grenade launcher^7
PASSIVES_STABLE_SILENCER_DESC: Integrated silencer that also prevents revealing of victim death locations.
PASSIVES_VRSCOPE_DESC: Optic counters Active Camo, Cold Blooded, and Hardwired.
PASSIVES_DURATION_HEALTH_DESC: Stays active for a longer period of time, but has lower health.
PASSIVES_ARMOR_DURATION_DESC: Higher resistance against explosive weapons, but has a lower active life time.
PASSIVES_SPEED_HEAVY_DESC: Increased movement speed, but has a heavier chassis, reducing its vertical boost capabilities.
PASSIVES_STEALTH_SPEED_DESC: Hidden through the use of reflective camo, but has lower movement speed.
PASSIVES_SPEED_COST_DESC: Increased movement speed, but requires a higher scorestreak cost.
PASSIVES_SPEED_DURATION_DESC: Increased movement speed, but has a lower active life time.
PASSIVES_ARMOR_SPEED_DESC: Higher resistance against explosive weapons, but has lower movement speed.
PASSIVES_BALCONVKIT_DESC: Enthusiast weapon mod that converts an energy weapon to ballistic, providing additional stability and speed for the first couple shots.
PASSIVES_HIGHDMG_DESC: Additional barrels allows for higher damage output and greater damage modifiers on target extremities.
PASSIVES_DBLCHAMBER_DESC: Additional barrel allows for a faster followup shot.
PASSIVES_RAILGUN_OVERLOAD_DESC: Fully charged shots that cause death will produce local damage.
PASSIVES_DEADEYE_PISTOL_DESC: Improved range and headshot damage.  Includes a built in pistol scope.
PASSIVES_TACTICAL_KIT_DESC: Improved underbarrel functionality.  Also prevents revealing of victim deaths.
PASSIVES_SMOKE_SIGHT_DESC: Smoke Drone underbarrel now moves slower and lives longer while a built in scope allows for easier acquisition of targets
PASSIVES_POWER_MELEE_DESC: Kills with this weapon have a chance to knock enemies back with great force.
PASSIVES_MELEE_KILL_SILENT_DESC: Faster melee speeds and kills cause enemies to gore into bits which will not reveal their death locations.
PASSIVES_PRIMED_DESC: Weapon now fires at full speed at the expense of some fire rate.
PASSIVES_OVERKILL_DESC: Landing shots on the head or torso cause the enemy to explode and cause local damage.
PASSIVES_FULL_AUTO_CONV_DESC: Converts the weapon to use full automatic fire.
PASSIVES_BURST_SHOTGUN_ALT_DESC: Shotgun mode now fires in bursts.
PASSIVES_SELECTOR_SWITCH_DESC: Provides the ability to switch between full-auto and semi-auto modes.  Comes with a built in VMC sight.
PASSIVES_SNIPER_PISTOL_COM_DESC: Converts weapon into an auto-fire sniper pistol.
PASSIVES_SNIPER_PISTOL_SILENT_DESC: Sniper pistol mod with an integrated silencer that also prevents revealing of victim death locations.
PASSIVES_TRIBARREL_BURST_DESC: Each of three barrels fire in quick succession.  Akimbo is disabled.
PASSIVES_MODE_SWITCH_SCORE_EPIC_DESC: Kills in alternating modes grant bonus score.  Epic scoring values are used.
PASSIVES_SIGHT_REFLEX_DESC: Provides a built in Reflex sight.
PASSIVES_SIGHT_PHASE_DESC: Provides a built in Trojan sight.
PASSIVES_SIGHT_HYBRID_DESC: Provides a built in VMC sight.
PASSIVES_SIGHT_ACOG_DESC: Provides a built in Scout sight.

PASSIVES_SIGHT_THERMAL_DESC: Provides a built in Thermal sight.
PASSIVES_LAST_SHOTS_AMMO_KBS_DESC: Kills with the last bullet in a magazine refills the mag.
PASSIVES_BERSERK_SILENT_DESC: Killing an enemy grants increased fire rate and reduced recoil for a short time.  Comes with an integrated suppressor.
PASSIVES_COLD_DAMAGE_GL_DESC: Underbarrel projectile temporarily slows target movement speed and also regenerates ammo.
PASSIVES_GL_SMOKE_DESC: Underbarrel provides a smoke grenade on impact.
PASSIVES_INCREASED_FIRE_RATE_ADS_DESC: Lightweight materials allow for a faster fire rate when aiming down sights.
PASSIVES_MINI_SPECIALIST_DESC: Every ^52^7 kills earns ^5Haste^7, ^5Ninja^7, and then ^5Takedown^7 (kills will not show skulls to the enemy team).  Bonus perks as the streak continues. Resets on death.
PASSIVES_FIRERATE_RAMP_DESC: Weapon ramps up in speed at the cost of initial speed and overall accuracy.
PASSIVES_SILENCER_M4_DESC: Comes with an advanced ^5suppressor^7 that retains more range than standard equipment.
